subject: Old stuff
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Receiver--aka Ghost box from April of 2002--I thought I made it later inthe
summer.  and a phone EVP saying I promised the people...I was about to dump
the EVP idea. Yeah, long history if wanting to run away from this stuff.


Frank
